title: ip.src
content:
The client TCP IP address, which may be adjusted to reflect the actual address of the client using HTTP headers such as `X-Forwarded-For` or `X-Real-IP`.

title: ip.src.asnum Â· Cloudflare Ruleset Engine docs
description: The 16-bit or 32-bit integer representing the Autonomous System
  (AS) number associated with the client IP address.
